mapper.insert: MERGE INTO CART USING DUAL ON (M_NO=#{m_no} AND P_NO=#{p_no} AND P_SIZE='S') WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET PAY_QUANTITY = PAY_QUANTITY + #{pay_quantity} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (M_NO, P_NO, PAY_QUANTITY) VALUES (#{m_no}, #{p_no}, #{pay_quantity})
mapper.delete: DELETE CART WHERE M_NO=#{m_no} AND P_NO=#{p_no}
mapper.select: SELECT P_NAME, P_NO, P_PRICE, P_IMG, P_DISCOUNT, PAY_QUANTITY, (P_PRICE * PAY_QUANTITY) AS P_SUM FROM CART NATURAL JOIN PRODUCT WHERE M_NO=#{m_no} ORDER BY P_NO
